markings: engraved at face of cup: [BENNETT CUP/American Intercollegiate Running Race/At Hampden Park-Springfield . . . Mass./July 17, 1873/WON BY/Duncan Ewen Bowie/of McGill University, Montreal, Ca-/2 MILES/Time 11 min. 18Â½ sec.]; stamped at underside of base: [STARR & MARCUS/NEW YORK/ENGLISH STERLING]
text: This trophy cup was presented to Duncan Ewen Bowie of McGill University in Montreal, Canada for winning the Bennett Cup at the Intercollegiate Running Race held in Springfield, Massachusetts on July 17, 1873. The race was two miles long and Bowie ran it in 11 minutes and 18-1/8 seconds. Its Neo-Grec decoration appropriately recalls the origins of such competitions in Ancient Greece.
title: Bennett Cup
